short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide ads (including ANNONS), plus, shop, wellobe and wellness on Aftonbladet.se

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install and see a cleaner version of Aftonbladet.se.

After install, a script is run each time you visit Aftonbladet.se that cleans it up.

New in v1.5: Automatically presses "TILL AFTONBLADET >" in order to skip the full page ad and head directly into the news.

What on Aftonbladet is being hidden?
* Ads
* Ad articles labeled with "ANNONS" on top
* "Wellness"-articles (ads)
* "Wellobe"-articles (ads)
* PLUS-articles
* Shop (commercial, payed articles)
* Automatically press "TILL AFTONBLADET" on the full page take-over ad
